member.name: T:JetBrains.Platform.VisualStudio.SinceVs14.Shell.Install.VsEmitHighResolutionIconsSinceVs14
member.summary: Emits high resolution icons for VS14 CTP3+.
member.remarks: To emit high resolution icons we need to: 1) Store xaml/baml and/or png icons to the package resources. 2) Create imagemanifest-file and put it to the folder where pkgdef and vsixmanifest reside. 3) Mark command buttonss with the new "IconIsMoniker" attribute in package's CTO (see CtoBuilder and VsctCommandFlags).

member.name: T:JetBrains.Platform.VisualStudio.SinceVs14.Shell.Zones.ISinceVs14Zone
member.summary: Visual Studio integrated products, VS 14.0 and above.
